channel.title: untagged on hey, it's Jeesoo
channel.description: Recent content in untagged on hey, it's Jeesoo

item.title: happy to see you here!
item.description: Here’s a cup of coffee for your trouble. I’m a software engineer dedicated to developing artistically novel graphics tools. It’s my personal goal to equip artists with more creative and efficient utilities – aka to fuel the creation of more deeply believable, beautiful, and expansive visual stories. I’m a programmer by craft, and a creative at heart! Here, I post about computer graphics, animation, and associated concepts that I’ve been learning and building.
